reviewText: I cannot believe that I have waited this long to watch the movie Out of Time.  It really was a great movie with some of the best action scenes.  Each actor did a spectacular job with bringing each of their respective characters to life.  This movie is truly a classic.  Not to mention The Mighty Quinn which is one of my all time favorites.  The acting is great and the reggae music is a plus.
Two very good movies with plenty of suspense. I especially liked "Out of Time". Lot's of great scenery in both movies.

I had seen "The Mighty Quinn" before and liked it. I had never seen "Out of Time" before and it was fantastic. Lots of twists and turns and had me wondering how he was going to get out of the mess he had gotten into.
